org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.disk

Class HddVm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Vm
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.vm.VMex
        • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.vm.MonitoredVMex
          • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.disk.HddVm

  • public class HddVm
extends MonitoredVMex
    A virtual machine with a harddisk. Unlike the other CloudSim implementations of virtual machines, this one models the contention caused by the I/O operations of the cloudlets.
    Author:
    nikolay.grozev

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.vm.MonitoredVMex

        MonitoredVMex.MonitoredData

        Constr.
        Parameters:
        name - - see parent class.
        userId - - see parent class.
        mips - - see parent class.
        numberOfPes - - see parent class.
        ram - - see parent class.
        bw - - see parent class.
        size - - see parent class.
        vmm - - see parent class.
        cloudletScheduler - - the scheduler that will schedule the disk and CPU operations among cloudlets.
        summaryPeriodLength - - the summary period for performance measurement.
        hddIds - - a list of ids of the harddisks that this VM has access to. If empty the VM has access to all disks of the host, which i hosting it at a given time.

        @Deprecated
public double updateVmProcessing(double currentTime,
                                             List<Double> mipsShare)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: Vm
        Updates the processing of cloudlets running on this VM.
        Overrides:
        updateVmProcessing in class Vm
        Parameters:
        currentTime - current simulation time
        mipsShare - list with MIPS share of each Pe available to the scheduler
        Returns:
        time predicted completion time of the earliest finishing cloudlet, or 0 if there is no next events

      • clone

        public HddVm clone(CloudletScheduler scheduler)
        Description copied from class: VMex
        Makes a deep copy of this VM. The only properties which are not copied are the id, the scheduler, the status, and the submission/start/end times. The id of the resulting VM is uniquely generated and the scheduler is provided as a parameter.
        Overrides:
        clone in class MonitoredVMex
        Parameters:
        scheduler - - must not be null. Must be a valid scheduler.
        Returns:
        a deep copy of this VM.
